images.path: images/Pocket Edition v0.1.3 alpha in game.png
images.alt_text: Pocket Edition v0.1.3 alpha in game

images.caption: An image of the j-version of v0.1.3 alpha

texts.text: v0.1.3 alpha was a Pocket Edition version added various minor changes and bug fixes.[1]

1 Android
1.1 Changes
1.2 Fixes
1.3 Internal version
2 iOS
2.1 Additions
2.2 Fixes
3 J-version
4 Demo
5 J-version demo
6 References

Better tablet support.
Less oversized in game UI elements.
Performance improvements, especially in Non-Fancy graphics mode.
Added cacti to deserts.
Added Turn Sensitivity setting.
Improved network chunk loading.

Fixed a crash when connecting to some iOS server maps.
Fixed blocks that were placed on snow were added incorrectly in multiplayer.

There are two different revisions. Their differences only appear to be in version number.
Version: 0.1.3(1035), Size: 1.58 MB
Version: 0.1.3(1036), Size: 1.58 MB
Added an "Update game!" block used as placeholder for not yet supported block types.

Improved network chunk loading.
Fixed bug with opening dialogs after closing the options menu.

v0.1.3j alpha was released to the Android Market on an unknown release date, providing support for older Android devices,[1] and added more sounds. The internal version is 0.1.3(1033) and has a size of 2.00 MB.

A free "lite" demo version of v0.1.3 alpha was released to the Android Market on December 3, 2011.[3] In mid-2014, it was removed from the Play/App stores.[4] The internal version is not currently known.

A free J-version "lite" demo of v0.1.3 alpha was released to the Android Market on an unknown release date. In mid-2014, it was removed from the Play/App stores.[5] The internal version is not currently known.
